author: riga
body:
This PR adds an initial tensorflow model for energy regression and particle identification that is used in the HGCal reconstruction. The model is described in detail in this [talk](https://indico.cern.ch/event/799486/contributions/3492052/subcontributions/284302/attachments/1875750/3088524/MLforTICL_Scrum.pdf) given at the last [Patatrack Hackathon](https://indico.cern.ch/event/799486).

In addition, I added a few links to the README for easy navigation.
title: Initial commit with CNN-based energy regression and ID tf model.
